label: cropNameCommon
comment: The common/local name of the crop species corresponding to the observation.

label: cropNameICC
comment: The name of the crop as given by the ICC (International Crop Classification) of FAO (Food and Agicultural Organisation).

label: cropNameBotanical
comment: The botanical nomenclature of the crop species corresponding to this observation.

label: cropCode
comment: The unique code for the crop species corresponding to this observation.

label: cropCodeICC
comment: The unique code assigned for the crop species as per the ICC (International Crop Classification) of FAO (Food and Agicultural Organisation).

label: seedVarietyCode
comment: The code assigned to the seed variety corresponding to this observation.

label: seedVarietyName
comment: The name of the seed variety corresponding to this observation.

label: seedGrowerInfo
comment: The personal details of the seed grower.

label: agronomicTraits
comment: The specific characteristics of crops that impact their yield, quality, and ability to resist biotic and abiotic stresses. These traits include plant height, tillering capacity, root length and mass, grain size and weight, etc.

label: season
comment: Represents specific time of the year that has distinct weather patterns and conditions, such as summer, autumn (fall), etc.

label: certificateInfo
comment: Date of issual, expiry/validity, renewal of the document/certificate corresponding to this observation.

label: localeInfo
comment: Locale information corresponding to this observation.

label: landIdentityInfo
comment: The unique land identification information corresponding to this observation.
